'''Charles "Chuck" Dixon''' ([[14 April|April 14]], [[1954]]) is an American comics writer.  Though he worked for both [[wikipedia:Marvel Comics|Marvel]] and [[wikipedia:DC Comics|DC]], he is best known for his work on the latter, especially on several ''Batman''-related titles, as well as on Conan stories.

==Selected Bibliography==
* [[1989]]-[[1990|90]]: ''[[The Hobbit (comic book)]]'' (adaptation of [[The Hobbit|the original]])
